title: Coke vs Pepsi
description: Coke is less sweet with a more acidic taste, while Pepsi is sweeter and smoother

title: Samsung vs Apple
description: Samsung offers more variety and innovation, while Apple provides a seamless, premium user experience

title: Google vs Facebook
description: Google is a search engine and tech giant with a focus on information, while Facebook (now Meta) is a social media platform focused on connectivity and social interaction

title: React Native vs Flutter
description: React Native offers faster development with a large community, while Flutter provides a more consistent UI and better performance across platforms.

title: Django vs Express
description: Django is a high-level Python web framework for rapid development, while Express is a minimal and flexible Node.js framework for building web applications
